content.title: Blue Collar Rocket
content.description: I built this as a capstone project of my web development boot camp. Blue Collar Rocket is an React app to streamline processes in handicraft.

content.title: This Website
content.description: I developed this website with Gatsby and Tailwind. I love sharing knowledge and learning in public. That's why I also implemented a blog.

content.title: LIFE-AHEAD.ORG
content.description: A personal project with the goal of starting a non-profit organization to help parents in grief. First done in WordPress then migrated to Chimpify.
